title: S Grades, ARAM, and EZ game EZ lyf.
body:
So after my previous PC died, I am now playing on an absolute toaster, it cost peanuts. Min required specs to play the game, and I run on lowest settings. I would upgrade it with components from my old PC, but I have this crazy weird high body static thing (I kill digital watches, etc) and I don't go near the inner workings of a PC, even though I know how.

Still good enough to get S grades, even when my flatmates cause me to have 250+ ping for an entire game.

I just want to share with you all, some tips on easy S grades, for your masteries, chests, etc.
I have had a whole bunch of S's lately, on champs I barely play, and I want to share how to get them.
Supports are so easy to get S grades on in ARAM, just build damage.

Janna is the easiest champ to get S on in ARAM. Build full AP, keep your deaths low (through your amazing move speed), I manage S grades on Janna around 50% of the time (usually A+ if I don't).

Similar with Nami, build full AP, always buff yourself with E, use W to attack, not healbot your team, get an easy S.

Lulu, now this is funny. Got my Lulu S today. Go AD Lulu. I use a runepage of attack speed with hybrid pen quints. Start sheen and boots, then build BotRK, Runaan's, and then finish your tri-force. If the game goes longer, get Wits End if you need MR, etc. Attack speed, not AD. Always use your E to shield yourself, your W to polymorph your target, and don't forget that BotRK active.

New Yorick is an easy S, get in before he gets nerfed. I got my S on new Yorick second time I played him.

Swain. Don't build RoA, you fucking muppet. Get the hextech thing that builds out of catalyst{{item:3030}} . Also Ryalis, Zhonyas, Abyssal, etc. Don't go tank in build, with items like {{item:3065}} , get hybrid damage and defense items. Use spell vamp quints if you have them.

I could go on and on, but I'm getting bored. Please share your tips on achieving S grades with various champs, so we can all revel in the glory of free stuff. ^_^
